title: Protecting Same-Sex Marriage from Supreme Court
itunes:title: Protecting Same-Sex Marriage from Supreme Court
description:
Katherine Franke, a Professor at Columbia Law School and Director of the Center for Gender & Sexuality Law, discusses the importance of passing the Respect for Marriage Act to protect same-sex marriage.

Thad Wilson, a Partner at King & Spalding, discusses the uncharted territory of crypto lender bankruptcies.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
